overview: Here Les Luthiers is a recital of the Argentine group of informal musical instruments Les Luthiers, made especially for the 45th edition of the Cosquín Folk Festival. It was presented for the only time on January 28, 2005, at the Plaza Prosper Molina in the city of Cosquín, Córdoba, Argentina, traditional venue of the festival.1

production_companies.name: Les Luthiers Producciones Artísticas S. R. L.

title: Les Luthiers: Aquí Les Luthiers
